p.d: Victoire and Florent are so worried that they decide to remain silent about their relationship. A hunt is organised to try to find Marion. Is she still alive? Florent also has to come to terms with the guilt of Marion's parents, Anne and Pierre, local worthies. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
